#summary This is the home page of the GL Service Google Code Wiki.

= Welcome! =
This project is home to the [http://igdawg.org/ Immunogenomics Data Analysis Working Group (IDAWG)] Genotype List service and client(s).

=First time here?=

To *set up the GL Service* for the first time, visit HackingGenotypeListService.

For an *overview* of how the service works, check out the SequenceDiagrams.

To find out how to correctly *format a GL String*, see Delimiters.



|| *Want to become a contributor?* Email one of the [http://code.google.com/p/genotype-list/people/list project owners] to be added to the group. ||
